text: A gavgavir bar ekiam iti, kamaghɨn amizɨ, nguibaba bar dar gumazamiziba ko, kantriba bar dar gumazamiziba ko, nguibabar akaba bar, me an atiatigha egha nɨsi. Eghtɨ a gumazitam mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghsɨ an aremegham. Eghtɨ a gumazitam ateghtɨ a ikɨsɨ, a ikiam. Egha a kamaghɨn ami, a gumazitamɨn ziam fɨsɨ, a fam. Eghtɨ a gumazitam dɨkabɨragh a gasɨghasɨghsɨ, ana damuam.
